unittitle_ssm: Zachariah Greene ledger and service program
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of one ledger kept by Zachariah Greene during the period 1787 to 1848, in which he recorded the marriages he performed as a minister at Presbyterian churches in the Long Island towns of Cutchogue and Setauket.
collection_ssm: Zachariah Greene ledger and service program
